page.text: The reptilian looks you over a moment "Finally, before we go any further I have some questions for you." she says somewhat imperiously.

choice.text: No, who are you and why do you think you can ask me questions

page.text: "I am Princess L'aang of the A'shan people. You may address me as your highness or possibly if you are greatly honoured, mistress. And I am asking questions to determine your suitability."

choice.text: $your highness? then why are you holding court in a bar
I see, still not answering your questions *walk away*

page.text: "I am temporarily inconvenienced that is all. In time I will be restored to my rightful place."
